casebody.data:
Clarence V. Kip, Respondent, v. John Ashcroft et al., Appellants. Decided April 13, 1887. Appeal by defendants from judgment entered on findings in an action tried at Special Term. Barnum & Rebhann, for appellants. George W. Van Slyck, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Freedman, J.

Opinion by Sedgwick, Ch. J.

Judgment reversed and new trial ordered, with

costs to abide event.
